name: Rotating Rockets
description:
This i s my entry for Kenney Jam 2021.

The game was made over 48hours, the Theme for the jam was 'Rotation'.

The game is controlled by the mouse or touch, you must rotate the planets to get the various coloured rockets back to there home planets.

How high a score can you get.

Check out my You Tube Channel for more Game Dev Goodness
